page.title: 13CHADDESLEY CORBETT BROWNIES
page.content: I belong to the 1st Chaddesley Corbett Brownie Pack. I enjoy Brownies because we do lots of badges like Cooks, House Orderly and Jester, that is quite hard because you have to do a play and say a poem. Joanna's Aunty Paddy and Mrs. Grange and Mrs. Rumsey and Mrs. Baines and Mrs. Pugh test us. You play lots of games like floods and outdoor games like rounders and stuck in the mud. We play games like dead lions and ladders inside. We had a teddy bears picnic on Monday. We went to Malvern for the celebration of 75 years of Guiding. We joined in Crackerjack at the B.B.C. in London. The smoke alarm went off and we went outside and saw the fire engines. We went on parade in Kidderminster for St. Georges Day and we go to church. We have parties at the village hall.
